channel.title: Organization on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Organization on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: How I Keep Track of 50 Projects at Once (& Maintain Some Sanity)
item.description: I’m currently in the process of finishing two books, starting another, publishing two new sexuality models, three new live social justice comedy shows, running half a dozen volunteer-based initiatives, building I’m-not-even-sure-how-many websites, and the list goes on. It’s a lot. And as I type that, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed.
